name: htbhf-applicant-web-ui
version_notice: Patch versions are incremented by Travis (in tag_version.sh via .travis.yml) - never manually increment the patch version

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon src/web -e js,json,html,njk
scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:lint test:unit -p -r start test:browser
scripts.test:acceptance: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=acceptance cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:smoke:test: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=smoke cucumber-js src/test/smoke/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/smoke/config' -f json:build/reports/smoke-report.json
scripts.test:compatibility: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=compatibility cucumber-js src/test/compatibility/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/compatibility/config' -f json:build/reports/compatibility-report.json
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:wait && npm-run-all -s test:accessibility test:acceptance test:acceptance:report
